long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Ptengine kit extension can enhance the performance of Ptengine heatmaps and experience no-code editor. The extension can ensure your page screenshot correctly after using interactive mode in heatmap. 
In addition, with the extension, you can have a better experience when using our no-code editor to change the page content such as the text or image on your page, or create popups or sticky bars for different devices.

we will constantly update features in this plugin.
